articles.title: Kim Jong Un Looks round Construction Site of Apartment Houses for Educators
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Looks round Construction Site of Apartment Houses for Educators
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, looked round the construction site of apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					 Going round the site, he learned in detail about the construction.
					
					  He was pleased to see the high-rise apartment houses. He said that the buildings with curved surface of their outer walls look like a sailing ship afloat on Taedong River, adding that they are fashionable structures reflecting the party's intention to steadily improve formative art in architecture and masterpieces demonstrating the architecture of the DPRK rapidly developing after the workshop for workers in the field of construction.
					
					 Noting that shops and other welfare and service  facilities on the ground floor of the apartment houses look nice and stable and entrance between corridor and drawing room has been constructed well, he praised the soldier-builders for constructing them as required by the design ratified by the party.
					
					 It is the work-style of the soldier-builders of KPA Unit 267 to fully meet the requirements of the construction method and successfully ensure the safety of the structure, holding high the slogan 'Let us take responsibility for the safety of the project and guarantee its absolute quality for all eternity', he said, calling on all those in the construction field to learn from their work style.
					
					 He gave an instruction to push ahead with the frame project and inside and outside plastering and the production of furniture at the same time.
					
					 As I always emphasize, in order to achieve successes in scientific research it is necessary to solve in a responsible manner the issue of living of scientists and researchers who conduct it, he stressed.
					
					 There is nothing to spare for the educators dedicating their whole life to training talents of the country, he said, noting it is the party's intention to build lots of such apartment houses to provide them to teachers and researchers in the future.
					
					 He underlined the need to construct more apartment houses for the teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology so that they may conduct education and scientific research free from worries in their living.
					
					 He said a new street would be formed on the bank of River Taedong if more apartment houses for 500 families of the educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology and service facilities appear with the apartment houses now under construction as an axis. He added that it was good to call it "Mirae Kwahakja (Future Scientists) Street".
					
					 He called for making the layout of the interior and exterior of the street at the best level and thereby using their construction as an occasion in making a revolution in the construction once again. He proposed completing the construction by the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) next year by sending a powerful building force made up of service personnel to the construction site of the street.
					
					 He said he would examine and decide on the issue of building more apartment houses for 500 families of educators of Kim Il Sung University as soon as possible.
					
					 He called on the soldier-builders to complete the construction of the apartment houses for the educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology by the founding anniversary of the WPK so that they may be provided to educators and researchers of the university. He expressed his expectation and conviction that KPA Unit 267 would realize the intention of the WPK in practice. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Lieut. General Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the National Defence Commission.

articles.title: KPA Will Wipe out Park Geun Hye-led Military Hooligans to Last One: Command of Southwestern Front of KPA
articles.content:
KPA Will Wipe out Park Geun Hye-led Military Hooligans to Last One: Command of Southwestern Front of KPA
						
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Command of the Southwestern Front of the Korean People's Army (KPA) issued the following open report on Wednesday:
					 The Park Geun Hye-led military gangsters' provocative hysteria has reached an extreme phase.
					
					 On May 20 alone, gangsters of the south Korean puppet navy perpetrated such a grave military provocation as firing at random at the warships of the Korean People's Army which were on regular guard duty in the southwestern waters of the DPRK side and peaceable Chinese fishing boats.
					
					 This was a deliberate grave provocative act of firing bullets and shells perpetrated by the south Korean puppet hooligans despite the fact that they were well aware warships of the KPA navy were operating to check the illegal fishing operations of Chinese civilian fishing boats in the sensitive waters.
					
					 The deliberate preemptive firing perpetrated by those military gangsters in the waters of the West Sea of Korea where the situation always remains so tense that a war may break out any moment can never be overlooked.
					
					 The gravity of the provocation lies in that it was timed to coincide with the mad-cap live-shell firing drills being staged by the gangsters everyday on Paekryong, Yonphyong and Taechong Islands, etc. while escalating their military intrusion into the waters of the DPRK these days.
					
					 Such premeditated military provocations being perpetrated by the Park Geun Hye group after amassing huge quantities of destructive weapons are not unrelated to its serious ruling crisis.
					
					 Angry south Koreans are now staging candle-light demos demanding "impeachment of Park Geun Hye" and the puppet military is being hit hard by the public for unceasing breach of military discipline and such foolish anti-DPRK racket kicked up by it, describing even a "door of toilet" as a "drone from the north".
					
					 The Park group let loose such unpardonable invective as terming the DPRK a "country which should disappear", triggering off an all-out retaliatory battle of its service personnel and people.
					
					 It is a sinister intention of the Park Geun Hye-led military gangsters to tide over its serious crisis and escape its shameful defeat in the local elections at hand by making military provocations against the DPRK in the sensitive waters.
					
					 The Command of the Southwestern Front of the KPA sends the following open notice:
					
					 1. From this very moment, all warships of the south Korean puppet navy, big and small, which recklessly maneuver in the sensitive waters of the southwestern front, hot spots, will become without exception targets of the direct sighting firing by all strike means under the above-said Command.
					
					 The warships of the puppet navy recklessly maneuvering at the direct instigation of the military hooligans are the root cause of military provocations deliberately straining the situation in the above-said hot spots and they are, therefore, targets of physical strikes which should be blown up without fail. 
					
					  2. The south Korean side will face military strikes of the KPA without any warning at the moment the latter detects any trifle provocation near the maritime guard demarcation of its army and around the five islands in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 It is the most urgent task for providing a sure guarantee for the peace of the country and the security of the nation to put under control the reckless preemptive firing, the height of confrontation with compatriots, in advance. 
					
					 3. We unhesitatingly clarify before the world our will to settle accounts with the villains of the south Korean puppet army right now if they are to fight us at any cost.
					
					 We advise them not to fire bullets and shells in the back lane awkwardly and cowardly but seek a formal military solution.
					
					 This stand is based on our resolute decision to wipe out the sworn enemy, confrontation maniacs, on this land to the last man.
					
					 The determined and practical military actions on the Southwestern Front of the KPA will help people clearly see in reality who will disappear and who will tower high on the ground and in the sea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Mexican Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Mexican Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Wednesday received credentials from Jose Luis Bernal Rodriguez, Mexican ambassador to the DPRK at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the ambassador after receiving the credentials.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Syrian Charge d'Affaires ad Interim
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Syrian Charge d'Affaires ad Interim
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, on Wednesday had a talk with Tammam Sulaiman, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Syrian embassy here, who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Chadian PM Reaffirms Support and Solidarity with Korean People
articles.content:
Chadian PM Reaffirms Support and Solidarity with Korean People
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Kalzeube Pahimi, prime minister of the Republic of Chad, met Jong Yong Chol, DPRK ambassador to his country, on May 15. 
					 The prime minister said he admired the Korean people who are successfully accomplishing the cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, rallied around Marshal Kim Jong Un in one mind.   
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed undying exploits for independence and the building of new society in Chad and other African countries.
					
					 I wish the Korean people greater achievements in the struggle to build a thriving nation and reunify the country under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The prime minister reaffirmed full support and solidarity with the just cause of the Korean people, adding it is the firm stand of Chad to boost cooperation with the DPRK in various fields.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Youth League Leaves for Vietnam
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Youth League Leaves for Vietnam
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League headed by Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, left here on Wednesday to take part in the meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth to be held in Hanoi, Vietnam.

articles.title: WFP Executive Director Leaves
articles.content:
WFP Executive Director Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Ertharin Cousin, executive director of the World Food Program (WFP), and her party left here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Congratulatory Performance of Moranbong Band Goes on
articles.content:
Congratulatory Performance of Moranbong Band Goes on
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Band gave a performance at the April 25 House of Culture on Tuesday. The performance was given on Monday in the presence of Marshal Kim Jong Un to congratulate the participants in the 9th national meeting of artistes.
					 Among the audience were creators and artistes in the field of literature and art and teachers and researchers in the field of art education here.
					
					 The performance began with the national anthem. Put on the stage were such numbers as female solo and pangchang "Thought of Love", light music "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt. Paektu" and female solo and pangchang "Thinking of the General".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by providing the brilliant tradition of revolutionary literature and art of the Workers' Party of Korea and ushering in a heyday of the Juche-oriented literature and art.
					
					  The finale "People Are United in Single Mind" and other numbers vividly represented the faith of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to trust and follow Kim Jong Un and remain loyal to him forever.

articles.title: Designers Visit Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
articles.content:
Designers Visit Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
 Wonsan, May 21 (KCNA) -- Designers of Pyongyang and local areas held a symposium on architectural beauty at the Songdowon International Children's camp after visiting it on Wednesday.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round various places of the camp including buildings with all amenities, the International Friendship Children's Hall, gymnasium, indoor swimming pool, playground, outdoor water park, aquarium and aviary.
					
					 Then a symposium on architectural beauty was held at the International Friendship Children's Hall.
					
					 Present there were O Su Yong, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers referred to the fact that Marshal Kim Jong Un made sure that the camp associated with the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was remodeled as a monumental edifice representing the Songun era.
					
					 They noted that detailed structural elements of the camp and its architecture were designed and decorated to suit the sentiments, emotion, aptitude and taste of schoolchildren.
					
					 They said the visit offered an opportunity to deeply grasp the noble intention of Kim Jong Un who spares nothing for children and realize once again what kind of buildings the Korean people and the rising generation require in a highly civilized socialist nation. 
					
					 The symposium stressed that it is an engine and a decisive factor of making the architecture of the DPRK surpass the world level to thoroughly carry out the idea and intention of the party without an inch of deflection, regarding the unitary leadership of Kim Jong Un as a lifeline.

articles.title: Int'l Friendship Children's Hall at Songdowon Camp
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de construccion de viviendas para educadores 
						
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea recorrio el lugar de construccion de las viviendas para educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek.
					El Mariscal se entero en detalles del estado de construccion recorriendo el lugar de construccion.
					
					Al ver las viviendas de altos pisos se mostro alegre diciendo que los edificios parecen como un barco de velas flotado en el rio Taedong por tratar paredes exteriores de los edificios de forma de la superficie curva y son peculiares y hermosos que reflejan el proposito del partido de desarrollar de continuo el caracter plastico de la arquitectura y una obra maestra que muestra la arquitectura de nuestro pais en rapido desarrollo despues del gran cursillo de los funcionarios de la rama de construccion.
					
					Dijo que la tienda y otras instalaciones de servicios publicos construidas en la planta baja son buenas a la vista y estables y se ha construido bien la entrada entre el pasillo y antesala, y evaluo que los constructores militares hacen la obra segun la demanda del  diseno firmado por el partido.
					
					Observar cabalmente en la construccion la demanda de la obra y asegurar con firmeza la estabilidad del edificio con la consigna "!Nos responsabilicemos con mil anos y garanticemos diez mil anos!" es el modo de trabajo de la unidad 267 del EPC, senalo y agrego que toda la rama constructiva debe aprender el espiritu de lucha de ellos.
					
					Ordeno impulsar simultaneamente la fabricacion de muebles junto con la obra de armadura y el repello interior y exterior.
					
					Subrayo que como enfatiza siempre, para lograr exitos en la labor cientifico-tecnica hay que resolver con responsabilidad los asuntos  que se presentan en la vida de los cientificos e investigadores.
					
					Diciendo que no hay nada que escatimar para los educadores que dedican toda su vida a la formacion del personal talentoso del pais, destaco que el proposito del partido es construir en el futuro muchas viviendas como estas para entregarlas a los profesores e investigadores.
					
					Propuso construir mas viviendas para que los profesores e investigadores de la universidad politecnica puedan concentrarse en la educacion y la investigacion cientifica sin tener nada que preocuparse de su vida.
					
					Si se construyen a la ribera del rio Taedong 500 viviendas mas en torno a las viviendas en plena construccion, aparecera una nueva avenida, dijo y propuso nombrarla como "avenida de los cientificos Mirae(futuro)".
					
					Prosiguio que al asegurar en el nivel supremo la formacion interior y exterior de la nueva avenida, se debe preparar un hito para registrar otra vez la revolucion en la construccion y prometio movilizar en esta obra el colectivo de constructores competentes del EPC para terminarla hasta el Dia del Sol (15 de abril) del proximo ano.
					
					Senalo que examinaria y decidiria pronto la construccion de 500 viviendas mas para los educadores.
					
					Exhorto a terminar la construccion de las viviendas hasta el dia de fundacion del partido (10 de octubre) y regalarlas a los profesores e investigadores de la universidad politecnica y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que la unidad 267 del EPC apoyara con accion el proposito del partido.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el secretario del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok, y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres, Ma Won Chun, quien es director de diseno del CDN.

articles.title: Sinwon Cement Factory, Haeju Unjong Beer Factory Go Operational
articles.content:
Sinwon Cement Factory, Haeju Unjong Beer Factory Go Operational
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Sinwon Cement Factory and the Haeju Unjong Beer Factory went into operation in South Hwanghae Province.
					 The building-material production base and the foodstuff production base helps lay the firm foundation conducive to developing economy and improving the people's standard of living in the province.

articles.title: Functional Building Material Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador mexicano
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- Jose Luis Bernal Rodriguez presento el dia 21 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema  de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de los Estados Unidos Mexicanos en Corea.

articles.title: Many Scientific Achievements Achieved in DPRK
articles.content:
Kalzeube Pahimi reafirma apoyo a justa causa de pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El primer ministro de la Republica del Chad Kalzeube Pahimi departio el dia 15 con el embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en su pais, Jong Yong Chol.
					En la ocasion el primer ministro expreso la admiracion de que el pueblo coreano lleva en adelante la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il uniendose monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Senalo que los Generalisimos acumularon imborrables hazanas en la lucha por la independencia y la construccion de nueva sociedad de Chad y otros paises africanos.
					
					Deseo que bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal el pueblo coreano lograra mayores exitos en la lucha por la construccion de un Estado prospero y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Reafirmo el entero apoyo y la solidaridad a la justa causa del pueblo coreano y subrayo que ampliar y desarrollar en varias ramas la cooperacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea son la firme posicion de su pais.

articles.title: Rice-transplantation Brisk in Countryside
articles.content:
Rice-transplantation Brisk in Countryside
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Officials and other working people in the field of agriculture and their helpers are all out for rice-transplantation.
					 Officials are joining the agricultural workers in the farm work, powerfully arousing their enthusiasm while scrupulously organizing it. 
					
					 Signal successes in rice transplantation have been reported from the plain areas along the west coast.
					
					 Agricultural workers in Kwaksan and Ryongchon counties of North Phyongan Province are transplanting rice seedlings in a large area of paddies every day, while ensuring both speed and quality in the work by raising the operation rate of tractors and rice-transplanting machines.
					
					 All co-op farms in Pyongyang and South Phyongan Province are also registering successes in the rice transplantation by giving precedence to such work as paddy field leveling, irrigation and harrowing, etc.
					
					 Those in South Hwanghae Province are carrying out their daily quotas without fail after working out their plans for each field and date. Co-op farms in Anak, Jaeryong and Yonan counties are fully ensuring the required number of rice plants per phyong and bunch while operating tractors, rice-transplanting machines and other farm machines in full capacity.
					
					 Co-op farms on the east coast are channeling efforts into transplanting rice seedlings in the right time as required by weather conditions.
					
					 The area under rice seedlings is increasing as the days go by thanks to the high enthusiasm of officials and other agricultural workers and their helpers across the country.

articles.title: Japan's Moves for Exercising Right to Collective Self-Defense Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves for Exercising Right to Collective Self-Defense Slammed
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The South Kyongsang Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the South Kyongsang  Provincial Progressive Federation and the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations of South Kyongsang  Province held a press conference at the provincial office on May 19 denouncing Japan for trying to exercise the right to collective self-defense, according to the south Korean Internet paper Voice of People.
					 At the press conference the organizations said that it is intolerable that Japan exercises the right to collective self-defense as it seeks to embellish the history of its past aggression and pave the way of reinvading the Korean peninsula through the revision of the Pacifist Constitution.
					
					 This is the violation of the UN Charter and the provocative declaration that Japan would take the road of invasion and war again, oblivious of its crimes as a war criminal state, they noted. 
					
					  In view of the Japanese prime minister's reckless remarks about "security" and "north's missile" it is clear that the Korean peninsula is the first target of the exercise of the right to collective self-defense, they said.
					
					 If Japan exercises the right to collective self-defense according to the U.S. strategy, this will put the peace on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia in peril, they noted.

articles.title: Spirit of Offence, Source of All Victories Won by DPRK
articles.content:
Presidente del CC de ACR recibe mensaje de consuelo de su homologo surcoreano
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea recibio un mensaje de consuelo que le enviara el dia 20 el presidente de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea.
					La misiva expresa profundas condolencias por las perdidas humanas causadas por el accidente ocurrido el pasado dia 13 en la ciudad de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye Regime
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean people are lamenting over the fact that they were taken in the honeyed lies of the conservative group and cast ballots to Park Geun Hye in the past "presidential election." They should not be taken in its lies again. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The gentries of the "Saenuri Party" are working hard to win popularity again while making much ado with political commitments with the approach of the June 4 local election.
					
					 This is nothing but a cunning ploy to cover up the unpardonable crimes of the party which pushed economy and people's living to a catastrophe with its treacherous policies and drove the inter-Korean relations into a phase of outbreak of a war and furthermore, caused the ferry Sewol sinking disaster, and escape from defeat in the election.
					
					 The present south Korean ruling forces are the ill-famed fascists, the root cause of evils bringing untold misfortune and death to the people and the anti-reunification group for confrontation bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that if the Park group is allowed to stay in power, all Koreans including south Korean people would suffer only misfortune and disaster.

articles.title: The U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK Are Bound to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
The U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK Are Bound to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK in political, military, ideological and cultural, economic and all other fields are bound to go bankrupt.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday says this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists brought down socialist and anti-imperialist independent countries in Europe one after another for the last decades. They are now making desperate efforts to break down the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The diehard confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. is the one between true and genuine socialism and imperialism making the last-ditch efforts and the one between the socialist fortress and the imperialist citadel.
					
					 With no force can the U.S. block the heroic service personnel and people of the DPRK who are confidently advancing, rallied close around the great Workers' Party of Korea with the immutable trust that socialism is sure to win.
					
					 The DPRK will certainly defeat U.S. imperialism with the great Songun idea, ideology of socialism, powerful weapon of independence and justice.
					
					 The U.S. had better know that the DPRK is an ideological vantage point directed against the former, not a vantage point of geopolitical importance the former is seeking to occupy.
					
					 The U.S. is boasting of monopolizing three-point strategic nuclear strike weapons but the DPRK has a great power capable of neutralizing the U.S. military muscle by dint of ideology.
					
					 The DPRK will in the future, too, stand against the U.S. by dint of ideology and launch a death-defying resistance war to bring the U.S. to ruin. There will be no concession and retreat of 0.001 mm.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising Observed in Seoul
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising Observed in Seoul
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations of various circles held a rally in the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on May 18 to mark the 34th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News.
					 The participants honored the memory of Kwangju fighters for independence, democracy and reunification and the schoolchildren buried at the seabed.
					
					 Speakers deplored that the history of south Korea is characterized by events of tragic death and its people have so far suffered from the trend of disregarding human lives.
					
					 They held that the Park Geun Hye "regime" like the successive dictatorial "regimes" is a brutal one which may kill and sacrifice the lives of the people anytime for maintaining power as it is machinery for dominating them.
					
					 The recent ferry Sewol sinking disaster brought to light the incompetence and irresponsibility of the "government".
					
					 They called upon all participants to deter the present "government" from going against history in a bid to revive "yusin," being greedy for power, utterly indifferent to the people's life.
					
					 They called for turning out in actions to prevent the recurrence of the disaster, not forgetting the souls of the Kwangju uprisers and the death of Danwon High School students.

articles.title: Anti-"government" Candlelight Action Staged in Seoul
articles.content:
Anti-"government" Candlelight Action Staged in Seoul
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Round-table Conference of People from All Walks of Life to Cope with Ferry Sewol Disaster in south Korea grouping at least 500 civic and public organizations sponsored a candlelight rally in Chonggye Plaza, Seoul, on May 17, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 Attending it were about 50 000 people from all walks of life including members of civic and public organizations, scholars, media persons, students, religionists and housewives.
					
					 It was held on the largest-ever scale after the ferry Sewol sinking accident.
					
					 Speeches were made to denounce the Park Geun Hye group for burying hundreds of persons in the seabed.
					
					 Rev. Kim Sang Gun underlined the need to correctly probe the truth about the disaster and call the "government" and "president" to account.
					
					 Ri Kyong Ho, senior vice-chairman of the Press Trade Union, noted that media persons were rising up in actions, adding that they would struggle for the resignation of the reptile KBS president kowtowing to power.
					
					 Kim Kap Su, professor at Kyunghee University, said the will to fight against the "government" which failed to protect the safety of the people in order to set right media which turned away their face to the truth and build a stable society.
					
					 Kim Jin Mo, student of Hanshin University, who is staging a hunger strike after having his hair cut close in demand of the probe into the ferry Sewol sinking accident, put on stage and asked "Is the ferry Sewol tragedy an accident or a murder?" The participants answered in chorus "Murder".
					
					 Jong Hyong Gon, chairman of the steering committee of the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations, said that people from all walks of life are now demanding the exhaustive probe into the truth and punishment of those responsible for the accident. He called for turning out in a million-people signature campaign reflecting the mind of the bereaved families.
					
					 The rally was followed by a demonstration.
					
					 Loudly heard in streets of Seoul were shouts "Park Geun Hye, resign!" "Park Geun Hye, take responsibility for disaster!" "Find out those missing!" "Bring our children to their lives!" and "Institute a special law!"
					
					  The participants gathered at the joint incense-burning altar at Seoul Square, honored the memory of the victims and expressed their will to stage a candlelight action with 100 000 people attending on May 24.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Urged to Step Down
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Urged to Step Down
						
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification in a statement on May 17 asserted the Park Geun Hye group can never evade the responsibility for the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					 Resentments run high in south Korean society due to the tragedy that took a lot of schoolchildren's lives, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The south Korean authorities pushed those people to deaths even though there was a possibility of saving them. Now they work desperately to shift the blame on to others and tide over the crisis.
					
					 Considering the tragedy as a big burden for them as the elections to local self-governing bodies are just at hand, the south Korean authorities employ every possible trick to divert elsewhere the public criticism.
					
					 As was disclosed one after another in the investigation by the prosecution, the Sewol tragedy is an inevitable product caused by the south Korean authorities' unpopular politics, the statement said, warning the Park "regime" can never evade the responsibility for the disaster.
					
					 As long as the Park "regime" remains in office, the second and third Sewol accident will be unavoidable as it does not care for the lives of the people, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Tragedy Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Tragedy Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) launched a sit-in strike on May 18 demanding a probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol tragedy and an enactment of a special law, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 The organization held a press conference in Chonggye Plaza in Seoul where they declared they would launch a sit-in to demand a probe into the truth about the tragedy due to the irresponsibility and incompetency of the "government", and to call Park Geun Hye to account.
					
					 Park and other conservative ruling forces made such thoughtless remarks that "people are ignorant", far from making apologies to the bereaved families who had to see their beloved children dying, it said and went on:
					
					 The ferry disaster was caused by the easing of regulations and the conspiracy between the capital and power for making money. If this is allowed to go on, the people will continue to meet grievous deaths in the railway field and at hospitals, schools, factories and construction sites.
					
					 There is nothing to expect from the authorities any more as they brand the people set out to correct wrong politics as "wicked rioters", the organization said, vowing to fight it out until the Park "regime" steps down.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Assailed for Censorship of Media
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Assailed for Censorship of Media
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- The former news director of south Korean KBS on May 16 disclosed that the present puppet regime put restrictions on KBS broadcasting activities, according to south Korean KBS on May 17.
					 He said that KBS has not made a report criticizing Park Geun Hye since she came to power.
					
					 He was given pressures several times from a high-ranking official of Chongwadae over various press reports and the president of KBS gave many instructions to delete or downsize some reports, he noted, adding:
					
					 He received instructions from Chongwadae and the KBS president on refraining from accusing the maritime police in reporting about the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					
					 Referring to the fact that he was compelled to resign from the post of the news director as he made the reckless remarks that the number of victims of the ferry sinking accident is not so much compared with the yearly traffic accidents, he noted that the KBS president prodded him to tender his resignation with tears in his eyes, saying it is the intention of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 In this regard, the KBS Media Persons' Association held a meeting of the emergency measure committee on May 18 at which it denounced Chongwadae for instructing the KBS president to put restrictions on the reports on the ferry sinking accident.
					
					 It declared that if the KBS president refuses to resign, it would launch a strike.
					
					 The heads of the news headquarters of KBS said that the former news director's disclosure is probably true in view of the KBS president's behavior. 
					
					 They said that they would resign from their posts as regards the situation of KBS.
					
					 The Democratic Alliance for New Politics, an opposition party of south Korea, denounced Chongwadae's censorship of KBS activities as a clear crime.
					
					 Park should immediately make an apology and punish those involved through the probe into the truth, it said, demanding an immediate resign of the KBS president.

articles.title: No Way-out for Park Geun Hye Regime: S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
No Way-out for Park Geun Hye Regime: S. Korean Paper
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) - The south Korean internet newspaper Minjok Ilbo in an article denounced the puppet authorities for pushing the north-south relations to the brink of a war.
					 The article said spokesman for the puppet Defense Ministry Kim Min Sok insulted the DPRK on May 12, pulling it up over its request for making it clear the story about the "north's involvement" in the drone case and conducting a joint investigation into it.
					
					 It is quite natural that the north rebuffed the drone story and demanded the joint investigation, the article said, adding the "joint central investigation team" which reportedly looked into the drone case was made up of experts from the U.S. side and there was a number of suspicious points in the results.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the authorities are peddling the story about the "north's involvement" in the drone case and branding those raising reasonable suspicions as the "forces following the north," the article noted.
					
					 As long as Kim Min Sok and Kim Kwan Jin remain at the Defense Ministry, a war disaster can become a reality, the article said, stressing the need for those who increase the danger of a war to resign at an early date.
					
					 The article said there is no way-out for Park Geun Hye regime which is forsaken by the people due to the Sewol disaster, the story about the "north's involvement" in the drone case and the thoughtless remarks made by Kim Min Sok.

articles.title: Actions of Koreans in U.S. against Park Geun Hye Spill over to Its Different Parts
articles.content:
Actions of Koreans in U.S. against Park Geun Hye Spill over to Its Different Parts
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Actions of Koreans in the U.S.  against the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea which caused the unprecedented ferry sinking disaster are spilling over to different parts of the U.S.
					 Koreans in Los Angeles have held a rally for 9 consecutive days outside the building of the puppet consulate general of south Korea and released a joint statement of compatriots' organizations in various parts of the U.S. on May 16.
					
					 The statement said although decades have passed since the Kwangju Popular Uprising started on May 18, 1980, the present dictatorial regime of south Korea perpetrated another crime by causing the ferry Sewol sinking disaster while desperately kicking up the racket of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It demanded the "National Assembly" of south Korea conduct a state investigation into the accident and probe the truth behind it and urged the media of south Korea to awake and honestly speak for the people.
					
					 On the same day there took place a candle-light meeting of Koreans in New York to honor the memory of victims of the ferry sinking disaster and denounce the incompetence of the corrupt south Korean regime.
					
					 On May 17 Koreans from various circles in the U.S. held an event in Los Angeles on the theme "From Mangwol-dong to ferry Sewol" to mark the 34th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					
					 Its participants honored the memory of the victims of the ferry sinking accident and staged a candle-light demo till they reached the south Korean consulate general after bitterly condemning Park Geun Hye for causing the disaster.
					
					 Next day Koreans in Washington and New York staged demos denouncing the press censorship and undemocratic acts being perpetrated by the south Korean regime as regards the ferry sinking accident and demanding a probe into the truth behind the accident.
					
					 Demos were reportedly staged also in 39 states of the U.S. including Georgia and California in denunciation of the south Korean regime on the same day.
					
					 On May 7 Korean professors in the U.S. posted on a website a statement calling the south Korean authorities to account and urging it to prevent the recurrence of the accident and protect the human rights of the victims and their bereaved families.
					
					 Meanwhile, intellectuals representing overseas Korean and foreign scholars held a joint press conference in Washington on May 13, at which they held that the disaster was caused by the immorality of the south Korean authorities and the Park Geun Hye regime is wholly to blame for it.
					
					 A joint statement in the name of 1 074 representatives of scholars was read out at the conference.
					
					 It held that the south Korean authorities are wholly accountable for the disaster.

articles.title: Victory, Glory Are Always in Store for Korean People: Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Victory, Glory Are Always in Store for Korean People: Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Songun brilliant commander and socialist Korea" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on May 11.
					 The article said:
					
					 The DPRK has emerged as an independent power which the U.S. styling itself as the only superpower dares not to provoke and a strong fortress defending peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The situation around Korea was very rigorous last year.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, expressed his resolute determination to take a practical and though state crucible measure to cope with the prevailing situation.
					
					 He declared that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will counter the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmail with merciless nuclear attack and their war of aggression with a just all-out war.
					
					 The U.S. and its following forces are upset by the pluck and grit of Kim Jong Un making resolute counterattack on the military threat of the enemies and taking toughest measures against the U.S. hardline policy.
					
					 After powerfully demonstrating the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK under the worst adversity, he led the entire army and people to make a great leap forward in building a thriving nation and highly civilized socialist state.
					
					 2013 was a year of pride and glory when the Korean people achieved a great victory in defending socialism and building a thriving nation which will be recorded long in history.
					
					 The international community praised it as a miracle and a fruition of the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Only victory and glory are always in store for the Korean people led by the peerlessly Songun brilliant commander.

articles.title: Nepalese Organizations Call for Taking Active Part in International Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits
articles.content:
Nepalese Organizations Call for Taking Active Part in International Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- Nepalese organizations on May 8 made public a joint appeal addressed to foreign organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people as regards the projected international internet seminar on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included the Nepalese National Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, Nepalese Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea, Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics and the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal.
					
					 The joint appeal said that world progressives loving peace are paying high tribute to the greatest men in the 20th century by holding colorful events and activities praising the whole life and undying exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Il Sung valiantly overcame all challenges and difficulties in the whole course of historical development and made sure that the DPRK fully demonstrated its might as the country of Juche and Songun, it noted.
					
					 It earnestly called upon world progressives to actively attend the international internet seminar on the great life and undying exploits of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It also called upon world progressives to positively take constructive steps to realize the cause of global independence, the lifetime desire of Kim Il Sung, and the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Guinean Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Guinean Personage
 Pyongyang, May 21 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given at Guinean Art College on May 12 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display at the venue of the lecture were photos documenting undying Songun revolutionary leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos introducing the achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The dean of Fine Art Faculty of the college said in a lecture titled "The feats leader Kim Jong Il performed by developing the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible party will shine forever":
					
					 June 19 this year is a significant day marking the 50th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 The history of his leadership over the WPK is an immortal history in which he performed great feats on behalf of the Korean nation and humankind with his outstanding political caliber.
					
					 He inherited Kim Il Sung's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven, set it as the party's supreme principle to meet the interests of the people and made sure that it was fully embodied in the party work and activities and thus developed the WPK into the party absolutely supported and trusted by the popular masses.
					
					 Though he passed away, the Korean people will register greater successes in building a thriving socialist nation, united closer around Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de construccion de viviendas para educadores
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre lugar de construccion de viviendas para educadores 
						
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea recorrio el lugar de construccion de las viviendas para educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek.
					El Mariscal se entero en detalles del estado de construccion recorriendo el lugar de construccion.
					
					Al ver las viviendas de altos pisos se mostro alegre diciendo que los edificios parecen como un barco de velas flotado en el rio Taedong por tratar paredes exteriores de los edificios de forma de la superficie curva y son peculiares y hermosos que reflejan el proposito del partido de desarrollar de continuo el caracter plastico de la arquitectura y una obra maestra que muestra la arquitectura de nuestro pais en rapido desarrollo despues del gran cursillo de los funcionarios de la rama de construccion.
					
					Dijo que la tienda y otras instalaciones de servicios publicos construidas en la planta baja son buenas a la vista y estables y se ha construido bien la entrada entre el pasillo y antesala, y evaluo que los constructores militares hacen la obra segun la demanda del  diseno firmado por el partido.
					
					Observar cabalmente en la construccion la demanda de la obra y asegurar con firmeza la estabilidad del edificio con la consigna "!Nos responsabilicemos con mil anos y garanticemos diez mil anos!" es el modo de trabajo de la unidad 267 del EPC, senalo y agrego que toda la rama constructiva debe aprender el espiritu de lucha de ellos.
					
					Ordeno impulsar simultaneamente la fabricacion de muebles junto con la obra de armadura y el repello interior y exterior.
					
					Subrayo que como enfatiza siempre, para lograr exitos en la labor cientifico-tecnica hay que resolver con responsabilidad los asuntos  que se presentan en la vida de los cientificos e investigadores.
					
					Diciendo que no hay nada que escatimar para los educadores que dedican toda su vida a la formacion del personal talentoso del pais, destaco que el proposito del partido es construir en el futuro muchas viviendas como estas para entregarlas a los profesores e investigadores.
					
					Propuso construir mas viviendas para que los profesores e investigadores de la universidad politecnica puedan concentrarse en la educacion y la investigacion cientifica sin tener nada que preocuparse de su vida.
					
					Si se construyen a la ribera del rio Taedong 500 viviendas mas en torno a las viviendas en plena construccion, aparecera una nueva avenida, dijo y propuso nombrarla como "avenida de los cientificos Mirae(futuro)".
					
					Prosiguio que al asegurar en el nivel supremo la formacion interior y exterior de la nueva avenida, se debe preparar un hito para registrar otra vez la revolucion en la construccion y prometio movilizar en esta obra el colectivo de constructores competentes del EPC para terminarla hasta el Dia del Sol (15 de abril) del proximo ano.
					
					Senalo que examinaria y decidiria pronto la construccion de 500 viviendas mas para los educadores.
					
					Exhorto a terminar la construccion de las viviendas hasta el dia de fundacion del partido (10 de octubre) y regalarlas a los profesores e investigadores de la universidad politecnica y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que la unidad 267 del EPC apoyara con accion el proposito del partido.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el secretario del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok, y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres, Ma Won Chun, quien es director de diseno del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador mexicano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador mexicano
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- Jose Luis Bernal Rodriguez presento el dia 21 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema  de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de los Estados Unidos Mexicanos en Corea. 
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Kalzeube Pahimi reafirma apoyo a justa causa de pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Kalzeube Pahimi reafirma apoyo a justa causa de pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El primer ministro de la Republica del Chad Kalzeube Pahimi departio el dia 15 con el embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en su pais, Jong Yong Chol.
					En la ocasion el primer ministro expreso la admiracion de que el pueblo coreano lleva en adelante la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il uniendose monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Senalo que los Generalisimos acumularon imborrables hazanas en la lucha por la independencia y la construccion de nueva sociedad de Chad y otros paises africanos.
					
					Deseo que bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal el pueblo coreano lograra mayores exitos en la lucha por la construccion de un Estado prospero y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Reafirmo el entero apoyo y la solidaridad a la justa causa del pueblo coreano y subrayo que ampliar y desarrollar en varias ramas la cooperacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea son la firme posicion de su pais.

articles.title: Presidente del CC de ACR recibe mensaje de consuelo de su homologo surcoreano
articles.content:
Presidente del CC de ACR recibe mensaje de consuelo de su homologo surcoreano
Pyongyang, 21 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea recibio un mensaje de consuelo que le enviara el dia 20 el presidente de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja del Sur de Corea.
					La misiva expresa profundas condolencias por las perdidas humanas causadas por el accidente ocurrido el pasado dia 13 en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
